name: Evolution Traveler
description:
Evolution Traveler is a roguelite game made for the 20 seconds game jam.

You are a wasknijper that has to evolve in order to eventually escape the space that you are trapped in. With only 20 seconds of life remaining your offspring will evolve in a being that is mightier in order to eventually successfully escape.

Main character by Lotte
Objects in second area by Nick
Development by Ravi
Click, pew, boom, slorp sounds voice acting by Ravi
Music by Alexander

You can move by aiming with the mouse button. 
Left mouse button to throttle.
Spacebar for shooting.
WASD for movement within skill tree interface.
Left mouse clicks on nodes to purchase skill tree upgrades.
Alt+F4 to quit the game.
